title: Bipartisan lawmakers introduce AI workforce training tax credit bill
description: Reps Josh Gottheimer and Mike Lawler introduced bipartisan legislation to create tax credits for companies training employees in artificial intelligence.
content:
House members from both parties joined to introduce legislation Wednesday aimed at incentivizing companies to train their employees to utilize artificial intelligence.

title: N R Narayana Murthy: AI and the Human Mind
description: Infosys founder N R Narayana Murthy emphasized that artificial intelligence will not surpass the human mind during a talk at Delhi University. title: India sets Guinness World Record with over 2.5 lakh AI responsibility pledges
description: India has officially achieved a Guinness World Record for the most pledges received for an artificial intelligence (AI) responsibility campaign within 24 hours.
